about_the_game:
ATMOSPHERIC AND EXPERIMENTAL

The CIPHER ZERO soundtrack seamlessly blends downtempo, chill, and experimental electronic genres. The album features intricate soundscapes, pulsating rhythms, and a dark, moody ambiance, immersing listeners in a captivating sonic journey of otherworldly beauty and melancholic introspection.

Tracks are provided in both high-quality MP3 and lossless FLAC formats.
detailed_description:
ATMOSPHERIC AND EXPERIMENTAL

The CIPHER ZERO soundtrack seamlessly blends downtempo, chill, and experimental electronic genres. The album features intricate soundscapes, pulsating rhythms, and a dark, moody ambiance, immersing listeners in a captivating sonic journey of otherworldly beauty and melancholic introspection.

Tracks are provided in both high-quality MP3 and lossless FLAC formats.
name: CIPHER ZERO soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 540 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Formats: MP3 and FLAC

short_description: Intricate soundscapes, pulsating rhythms, and a dark, moody ambiance. An essential take of the dynamic soundtrack present in CIPHER ZERO by its composer, Will Seegers.
